statements: DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'Canada' AND state = 'Ontario';
DELETE FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Example Supplier');
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity <= 10 AND price > 100;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2001 OR supplier_id = 2002 and contact_email='supplier@example.com';
